name: Circus of Light
blurb: Beautiful hand-drawn video game about a unique circus that only takes place when lightning strikes. Join \u00c5ska in her quest to save it.

rewards.reward: Thank you very much! You get an official digital certificate of being a Circus of Light Sledge Gang member (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) with your name on it.

A digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A limited edition printed poster of The Circus of Light game signed by us; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A 'walk on' character in The Circus of Light game named after you, appearing in the credits. Your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A t-shirt of The Circus of Light game; a digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A deluxe limited edition boxed usb stick copy of The Circus of Light game signed by us. A deluxe limited edition poster of The Circus of Light game; a Circus of Light t-shirt; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A hand made replica hat of the main character in The Circus of Light game (inspired on the Sami people's costumes); a digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A supporting role's face designed using a picture of your face as inspiration, appearing in the credits with your name; a digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A custom made replica circus slippers (in your size) of the main character of The Circus of Light game; a digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).

A custom made replica jacket (in your size) of the main character of The Circus of Light game; a digital copy of The Circus of Light game; your name in the credits under the title 'Sledge Gang' (the crew members which pound in the circus' tent poles) for the Circus of Light game; and a digital certificate of being a Sledge Gang member (with your name on it).
